casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Cornelius TUCKER, Jr. No. 118P01-13. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th day of February 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari/motion to vacate to review the order of the Superior Court, Forsyth County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
